spaska.classifiers.util

Class Node

  • java.lang.Object
    • spaska.classifiers.util.Node

  • public final class Node
extends Object
    Represents a node in tree based classifiers.

    If you are implementing a hierarchical classifier this is the utility class that should be used to represent a node in the resulting tree.

    Author:
    nikolavp
